Unequal answered the call with its EXOskeleton â¢ technology that it originally developed for the military. Michael Vick used the Unequal Chest Protector in the November 7th game against the Indianapolis Colts to protect his ribs. After the game Michael Vick said the Unequal Pad made him feel invincible.
